page.title: 19A SCHOOLBOY'S DAY,HIGH HAM
page.content: My name is Ben, I am 8 years old and I go to High Ham Primary School. I get up at 7.00am. Then I have cereal and toast for breakfast. At 8.30am I go to school. I play with my friends,usually football, before school begins at 9.00am. I work in class doing maths & English until break time at 10.30am. After break at 11.00am I do more work, sometimes writing stories,or drama,or painting. Lunch is at 12.15pm. I have a school dinner cooked in the school kitchen. Afternoon school begins at 1.30pm and ends at 3.30pm. In the afternoons we do art and crafts, or sport and have a story-time. After school I usually stay for a club such as swimming, cricket, football or athletics. When I go home I have tea of sandwiches, biscuits & fruit. Then I watch television and do my homework before bath- and bedtime at 8.00pm.
